results.raw_content:
Press Release
INTRODUCING BLACKLYTE: THE NEW SMART INNOVATIVE HOME BRAND THAT AIMS TO REDEFINE THE WAY YOU WORK, LIVE AND PLAY
The MarketWatch News Department was not involved in the creation of this content.
The Canadian-founded company makes its official market debut at CES 2024
TORONTO, Dec. 11, 2023 /CNW/ - Get ready to immerse yourself in a world where technology meets lifestyle. Blacklyte, a new Canadian-founded entertainment company is the latest player to step into the smart-gaming, lifestyle and tech category with their line of ergonomic chairs, stand-up desks, Pixel-boards, and RGBUV LIGHTSTRIP -- the only RGBUV in the market.
An innovative global brand that embodies a creative lifestyle, Blacklyte's journey began with a vision to revolutionize entertainment experiences by creating immersive solutions driven by technology -- enabling customers to personalize their space to their lifestyle and make every moment uniquely theirs, combining the realms of work and play like never before.
Established in 2021, Blacklyte stands as a pioneering entertainment company at the forefront of innovative technology. Recognizing the diversity of individual preferences and desires, the company is dedicated to meeting those unique needs and developing features and a comprehensive smart control system.
Since soft-launching in Fall 2023, Blacklyte has held a significant presence in the e-sports, intelligent lighting, and trendy peripherals industries with partnerships with heavy-hitters like Maple Leaf Sports & Entertainment (MLSE), Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) and Intel, to name a few.
"Blacklyte empowers users to personalize their entertainment experiences according to their distinct tastes through the use of transformative technology," says Alex Liu, Founder and CEO of Blacklyte. "And after a successful soft-launch in Canada, we are ecstatic to be making our market debut at the biggest tech event in the world, CES and look forward to growing Blacklyte's global footprint in the smart home category"
The company is officially launching and making its market debut at CES 2024 -- with an impressive 2-storey 3,200 sq. ft. booth, which includes 6 rooms where attendees can immerse themselves into a world of Blacklyte and envision what their own space would be like decked out with featured Blacklyte products.
Visitors to the booth will experience LIVE podcasts, a game-streaming room, a DJ booth, office settings and a space for influencer and media content creation. Their booth (52823) is located in the Venetian Expo, Halls A-D in the Smart Home Category
For more information on Blacklyte, please visit: BLACKLYTE -- Blacklyte Inc. (goblacklyte.com)
ABOUT BLACKLYTE
Established in 2021, Blacklyte stands as a pioneering entertainment company at the forefront of innovative technology. Recognizing the diversity of individual preferences and desires, we are dedicated to meeting those unique needs. Our commitment is reflected in the development of cutting-edge features and a comprehensive smart control system, empowering users to personalize their entertainment experiences according to their distinct tastes. Blacklyte holds a significant presence in the e-sports, intelligent lighting, and trendy peripherals industries. For further details, please visit our website at goblacklyte.com.
View original content to download multimedia:https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/introducing-blacklyte-the-new-smart-innovative-home-brand-that-aims-to-redefine-the-way-you-work-live-and-play-302010267.html
SOURCE BLACKLYTE
View original content to download multimedia: http://www.newswire.ca/en/releases/archive/December2023/11/c7964.html
/CONTACT:
Media Contacts: Samantha Machan, Swerve PR, Smachan@swervepr.com

About us 1
Our story：
BLACKLYTE is a global trendsetting brand that embodies the concept of a creative lifestyle. Our journey began with a vision to revolutionize entertainment experiences by creating immersive solutions driven by technology. We are dedicated to empowering diverse communities and enabling users to transform their spaces and immerse themselves in a personalized lifestyle. At the core of our brand, we draw inspiration from fashion design, incorporating aesthetics and functionality into every product we create. Our commitment to high-performance core technology ensures that our solutions deliver cutting-edge experiences to our users. Personalization is a key aspect of the BLACKLYTE brand. We understand that each individual has unique preferences and desires, and we strive to cater to those needs. Through our innovative features and one-stop smart control, we empower users to customize and tailor their entertainment experiences according to their personal tastes. With a strong presence in the e-sports, intelligent lighting, and trendy peripherals industries, BLACKLYTE has garnered a vast community of millions of registered users. We are proud to have become a trusted name in the global consumer electronics field, known for our commitment to quality and innovation. Our journey doesn't end here. We continuously explore and push the boundaries of what is possible in the world of immersive entertainment. We are driven by the desire to introduce unprecedented ways of experiencing entertainment, creating greater possibilities for individuals to embrace and enhance their personalized lifestyles. BLACKLYTE invites you to join us on this exciting journey, as we redefine the way people engage with entertainment and technology. Together, let's unlock new realms of immersive experiences and empower individuals to shape their own extraordinary lifestyles.
BRAND EXTENSION PARTNERSHIP:
BLACKLYTE is exploring brand extension programs across all categories and channels of distribution. Such as the partnership with AMD, we are aiming to create more possibilities of cooperation with world’s leading brands in the field, through bringing more ways of interactions among our users and consumers.
History：
July 2023:
Since the launch of the Athena series, BLACKLYTE has actively participated in various large-scale events, with their revolutionary gaming chair quickly becoming a global sensation, capturing the hearts of gamers worldwide and providing an unparalleled gaming experience.
July 28, 2023:
As an AMD partner, BLACKLYTE made a significant appearance at the Linus Tech Expo, attracting widespread attention. The ergonomic Lambor Support and stylish design of their flagship gaming chair received unanimous acclaim.
August 18, 2023:
The CNE selected the BLACKLYTE Chair Game Table to set up the gaming garage, awarding the BLACKLYTE Chair seat as a prize to the winner of the competitive game. Our esports initiatives received praise from both the tournament committee and esports enthusiasts.
August 24:
Fanexpo:
AMD and BLACKLYTEjoined forces to establish an engaging gaming hub at Fanexpo. Inside our specially designed container, numerous influential Twitch streamers conducted live broadcasts, garnering significant attention.
2024
Experience the essence of BLACKLYTE at CES, where the brand's story converges with the unveiling of a truly remarkable and revolutionary product in 2024. Join us in eager anticipation of the grand online launch of this groundbreaking new addition.

Redefining Lifestyle Tech with Innovation and Immersion
Founder of the esports chair category
BLACKLYTE is not just a brand; it represents a creative lifestyle with a vision to revolutionize entertainment through immersive technology. Our journey started by empowering diverse communities, enabling users to personalize their spaces for a unique lifestyle. Inspired by fashion design, we blend aesthetics and functionality into each product, ensuring a seamless fusion of style and innovation. Personalization is at the core of the BLACKLYTE brand, catering to diverse preferences through innovative features and a one-stop smart control system for tailored entertainment experiences. With a strong presence in e-sports, intelligent lighting, and trendy peripherals, BLACKLYTE is a trusted name in global consumer electronics, known for our dedication to quality and innovation. Our journey continues as we push the boundaries of immersive entertainment, introducing unprecedented ways for individuals to embrace and enhance their personalized lifestyles.
BRAND EXTENSION PARTNERSHIP
BRAND EXTENSION PARTNERSHIP
BLACKLYTE is at the forefront of exploring brand extension programs across all categories and channels of distribution. Our partnership with AMD is just the beginning, as we aim to create more possibilities of cooperation with the world’s leading brands in the field, fostering interactions among our users and consumers.
BRAND EXTENSION PARTNERSHIP
BRAND EXTENSION PARTNERSHIP
BLACKLYTE is at the forefront of exploring brand extension programs across all categories and channels of distribution. Our partnership with AMD is just the beginning, as we aim to create more possibilities of cooperation with the world’s leading brands in the field, fostering interactions among our users and consumers.
A GLIMPSE INTO OUR HISTORY
Since the launch of the Athena series, BLACKLYTE has actively participated in various large-scale events, with their revolutionary gaming chair quickly becoming a global sensation, capturing the hearts of gamers worldwide and providing an unparalleled gaming experience.
BLACKLYTE is exploring brand extension programs across all categories and channels of distribution. Such as the partnership with AMD, we are aiming to create more possibilities of cooperation with world’s leading brands in the field, through bringing more ways of interactions among our users and consumers.
The CNE selected the BLACKLYTE Chair Game Table to set up the gaming garage, awarding the BLACKLYTE Chair seat as a prize to the winner of the competitive game. Our esports initiatives received praise from both the tournament committee and esports enthusiasts.
At Fanexpo, AMD and BLACKLYTE joined forces to establish an engaging gaming hub. Inside our specially designed container, influential Twitch streamers conducted live broadcasts, garnering significant attention.
Experience the essence of BLACKLYTE at CES, where our brand's story converges with the unveiling of a truly remarkable and revolutionary product. Join us in eager anticipation of the grand online launch of this groundbreaking new addition. Embrace the future of lifestyle tech with BLACKLYTE, where innovation meets immersion, and extraordinary lifestyles unfold.

results.title: Blacklyte Makes Market Debut at CES 2024 | GamingShogun
results.content: Blacklyte Makes Market Debut at CES 2024 Get ready to immerse yourself in a world where technology meets lifestyle. Blacklyte, a new Canadian-founded entertainment company is the latest player to step into the smart-gaming, lifestyle and tech category with their line of ergonomic chairs, stand-up desks, Pixel-boards, and RGBUV LIGHTSTRIP ...
results.raw_content:
Blacklyte Makes Market Debut at CES 2024
Get ready to immerse yourself in a world where technology meets lifestyle. Blacklyte, a new Canadian-founded entertainment company is the latest player to step into the smart-gaming, lifestyle and tech category with their line of ergonomic chairs, stand-up desks, Pixel-boards, and RGBUV LIGHTSTRIP – the only RGBUV in the market.
An innovative global brand that embodies a creative lifestyle, Blacklyte’s journey began with a vision to revolutionize entertainment experiences by creating immersive solutions driven by technology – enabling customers to personalize their space to their lifestyle and make every moment uniquely theirs, combining the realms of work and play like never before.
Established in 2021, Blacklyte stands as a pioneering entertainment company at the forefront of innovative technology. Recognizing the diversity of individual preferences and desires, the company is dedicated to meeting those unique needs and developing features and a comprehensive smart control system.
Since soft-launching in Fall 2023, Blacklyte has held a significant presence in the e-sports, intelligent lighting, and trendy peripherals industries with partnerships with heavy-hitters like Maple Leaf Sports & Entertainment (MLSE), Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) and Intel, to name a few.
“Blacklyte empowers users to personalize their entertainment experiences according to their distinct tastes through the use of transformative technology,” says Alex Liu, Founder and CEO of Blacklyte. “And after a successful soft-launch in Canada, we are ecstatic to be making our market debut at the biggest tech event in the world, CES and look forward to growing Blacklyte’s global footprint in the smart home category”
The company is officially launching and making its market debut at CES 2024 – with an impressive 2-storey 3,200 sq. ft. booth, which includes 6 rooms where attendees can immerse themselves into a world of Blacklyte and envision what their own space would be like decked out with featured Blacklyte products.
Visitors to the booth will experience LIVE podcasts, a game-streaming room, a DJ booth, office settings and a space for influencer and media content creation. Their booth (52823) is located in the Venetian Expo, Halls A-D in the Smart Home Category
For more information on Blacklyte, please visit: BLACKLYTE – Blacklyte Inc. (goblacklyte.com)
